cause.description:
Kidney disease is a genetic disease and we need to stop it before it's too late. It's a true thing. People are on waiting list and some have been there for a very long time and still is waitting. It's harsh reality but it's true. Most people have died of this disease and it's getting more and more common. Please donated or invite people and share this cause.
1. We must find a cure now
cause.mission: It's just to find a cure and raise money for those who have lost a love one from this disease or is on the waiting list to get a transplant of the kidney.
cause.name: Kidney Disease foundation of Canada
